title: Pit-Hag

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night except the first, Target a player and select a role; that player becomes that role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You do not change people’s alignments

desc:
Post 3669
*”Round about the cauldron go; In the poison'd entrails throw; Toad, that under cold stone; Days and nights has thirty-one; Sweated venom sleeping got; Boil thou first in the charmed pot."*
